item.description:
Hi Everyone,

The Spider-Man 3 movie is 2 hours and 20 minutes long and
it's rated PG-13.

Al's note..that means the kids in the group can go and not be offended...LOL

Showtime is 7:05 PM. Date is Tuesday, June 12, 2007.

Everyone should arrive by 6:45 PM and purchase their
ticket.

The group will meet inside the lobby area

Address is:

Showcase Cinemas Buckland Hills
99 Redstone Road
Manchester, CT 06040
(860) 646-9800

Getting there..

either direction on 84 take exit 62 towards the mall.
Go south on Buckland Street look left for a TUX shop right before the left turn light going up the rocks, this is Redstone Road.

Mapquest, GPS and others will give you a good idea where it is by entering the exact addess.


Let me know if you need any further information.

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Elaine's Movie Suggestion For Tuesday Night
